name: ZELCAN Hydraulic Hose Cap & Plug Kit, 144-Piece JIC & ORFS Plug and Cap Assortment Kit for Dash Size 4 6 8 10 12 16, Heavy-Duty Hydraulic Hose Fitting Kit for Industrial Pipe Tube Sealing
short_description: Complete Set: Zelcan's 144pc hydraulic hose fitting kit includes both ORFS & JIC caps and plugs in -4, -6, -8, -10, -12, and -16 sizes to match the most common hydraulic fittings. Ideal for equipment maintenance in agriculture, industry, and construction

No Slips, No Strips: Our well-cut threads help prevent misalignment, support higher pressure loads, and reduce long-term wear on mating parts. Each cap and plug features a hex head that pairs easily with socket tools for secure handling

Reliable & Tight Sealing: With precise 37° flare threads and O-ring face seals following SAE standards, these fittings create a secure seal that blocks oil leaks during service. They help protect your equipment from pressure loss and fluid contamination

Built to Withstand Tough Use: Built from galvanized 1045 steel, these JIC caps and plugs can handle tough working conditions. They're built to stand up to vibration, pressure spikes, and rough outdoor environments

Neat and Ready: Our hydraulic plug and cap kit comes in a blow-molded case with a custom EVA insert to keep every piece right where it belongs. It’s easy to carry and perfect for organized repairs on-site or in the shop

name: 3/8’’ Hose x 3/8’’ JIC 37 Degree Female Swivel Hydraulic Hose Crimp Fittings, 10PCS Set for Single Wire Hydraulic Hose
short_description: Specification: Crimps with 3/8" I.D. hydraulic hose, features a 3/8" female JIC 37 degree swivel end. Suit for fluid power systems and other hydraulic applications.
Application: Crimp hose fittings are used in general purpose applications with petroleum-based fluids, gasoline, fuel, lubricating oils, and other industrial fluids.
Hydraulic Fitting Connection Type: Permanent crimp fittings type, which require a presence of the crimping machine to attach a hose to a fitting. Straight fitting shape.
Material: Carbon steel features more durable and improve the resistance to the heat which can withstand the temperatures from -65°F to 500°F.

Hydraulic hose fittings connect hoses to pumps, valves, cylinders and other components used throughout a hydraulic system. These secure connections help contain and direct the flow of hydraulic fluid to where it is needed while preventing leaks and safely maintaining pressure.

short_description: Seamless Compatibility: Crimp hose fittings are designed for easy connection with 3/8" I.D. hydraulic hoses. These fittings have a 1/2" NPTF external thread end, ideal for fluid power systems and hydraulic applications.

Versatile Application: Hydraulic Hose fittings are made of premium carbon steel, can endure temperatures from -65°F to 500°F, suitable for use with industrial fluids, including petroleum-based fluids, gasoline, fuel, and lubricating oils.

Secure Connections: 1/2" NPTF male fittings have a permanent crimp design, requiring a crimping machine to connect a hose and fitting securely to prevent leaks. The straight shape of the fitting further improves connection stability.
